content.content: Life is Strange Remastered stars Max Caulfield, a photographer who discovers she can rewind time. I took on the challenge of redesigning the episode selection menu because I was determined to design a menu that connects the player more closely with not only the characters, but evoke more emotions through the UI before they are taken into the narrative adventure.

content.title: Life is Strange Remastered: Episode Selection Redesign

content.content: The original design of this screen showcases episodes in a horizontal tile, by enlarging the photo showcased on the tile to be part of the main background. A scribbled up arrow is presented towards the right of the last tile to indicate there are more tiles to view.

While concepting out a redesign of this screen, I didn’t want to create an entirely new theme. Instead, I wanted to reconstruct the way the player cycles through each episode, by introducing a special touch to it...

items: Showcase only one episode tile at a time to create curiosity.
Encompass each episode to reflect a polaroid of episode preview.

content.content: For the episode cards, I made sure to include the following elements to give it more character:

items: Sharpie marking for episode and title
